infrastructure.Sound
Class SoundByte

java.lang.Object
  infrastructure.Component
      infrastructure.SelfRegisteringComponent
          infrastructure.Sound.SoundByte
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDrawable, IUpdateable
public class SoundByte
extends SelfRegisteringComponent

Wrapper for AudioSample that reports its length and allows simple playing and autoremoval from parent app. Used by SoundManager Relies on Minim.AudioSample

Author:
Gadi
